dct_title_s: Part of the map of Mexico prepared by J. Disturnell and published in New York in 1847
dct_description_sm: Published in: Boundaries, areas, geographic centers and altitudes of the United States and the several states / Edward M. Douglas. Washington : Government Printing Office, 1923. Geological Survey Bulletin 689.; Relief shown by hachures.; Prime meridian: Washington.; "Bulletin 669, Plate IV."; "A photographic reproduction of the part of the map referred to in the treaty of Guadalupe-Hidalgo of 1848 ... ."; Includes text.; Includes southwestern USA and northwestern Mexico.
dct_rights_sm: Use of this item may be governed by US and international copyright laws. You may be able to use this item, but copyright and other considerations may apply. For possible additional information or guidance on your use, please contact the contributing organization.
